summary: A comprehensive test suite for the Prefect orchestration client, covering CRUD operations and behavior for artifacts, automations, API keys, API version headers, client context management, proxy configuration, work queues, client retrieval and injection, deployment schedules, data document resolution, variables, work pools, concurrency limits, flow and task runs, server type detection, TLS settings, and related error handling.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, robustness, and compliance of the Prefect client library with expected API contracts and configuration scenarios, ensuring reliable interaction with the Prefect server across a wide range of functionalities.
